artist: Maker: Joseph Craddock; Maker: William Reid
creditline: Gift of the Charles Bolles Rogers Family: Frederick Van Dusen Rogers, Nancy Rogers Pierson, Mary Rogers Savage
markings:
Marks

Fully marked on underside of body.  Lion passant and sovereign\'s head on handle.  One illegible mark, date latter and maker\'s mark on underside of cover.  Number 2 stamped on handle, body, and cover.
title: Tureen
